entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 11. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
